p: Dry matter (90.86%) was positively correlated with axis 3. The species with high content of dry matter were Cola acuminata, Saba comorensis, Sphenostylis stenocarpa, Tetracarpidium conophorum, Brachystegia nigerica, Balanites aegyptiaca, Vitellaria paradoxa, Pentaclethra macrophylla, Sterculia africana and Irvingia gabonensis ( Appendix 2, Fig.Â 2).
